website_summaries.verdict: Better for 1 rider than 2, this offers towable fun for multiple seasons thanks to a sturdy cover and bladder.
pros: Easy to inflate, with an included Boston valve
Cover is very sturdy, as is the interior bladder
Fast or slow towing is enjoyable
Towable is stable on the water, and pops nicely into the air on wakes
Easy to climb back on when in the water
cons: Barely fits 2 adults, and is more comfortable for just 1 rider
Tow line attachment is a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: It’s not leaking - close the valve!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine slowly lost air like several other reviewers mentioned. After a trip to the lake, I unzipped the side pocket to allow it to dry out. I found another fill valve behind the zipper that was not closed. There is a check valve, so the tube deflated very slowly. However, the leak was enough to cause concern and for me to consider returning it. I have since closed the valve and am pretty sure this is why so many reviewers mention leaking. The tube is really great. If you buy one, however, make sure the secondary fill valve is closed and secured.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot Believer

customer_reviews.title: Kids' favorite
customer_reviews.text: We live on a lake and tube regularly with our 9 children. Needless to say these are heavily used! This is a favorite for our kids who are learning and our skilled riders that I fling around pretty good. These have stood up to extensive use and I am buying 2 more to replace some Airhead brand tubes that are rough on the kids' legs.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality..
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good, heavy duty quality. Holds two teens fine and has a little drivability when used solo. We use an electric inflator/deflator that only takes a minute either way. It's nice that once deflated, it doesn't take up much room and weighs enough that I don't worry about it blowing out. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Dunstan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to pull behind our pontoon. Our kids are 8-11 and they love it. We have pulled this for about 40 hours this summer alone with zero issues. You can really get this swinging and it is stable for kids and adults. Very satisfied overall and if it survived our family it is a well made product!
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy but small
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this will only fit one adult comfortably. Two lil kids but only 1 adult. It’s super well made but I ended up Buying another one that was a 3-4 person to fit two teen boys.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is a slim tube
customer_reviews.text: We have used this tube a handful of times this summer - seems to be holding up well. We are able to fit 2 toddlers and an adult on the tube, it's a little tight but doable. Definitely not large enough for two grown adults. I like that it is a slim tube, not so bulky so it is easy to throw in and out of the boat as well as store in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Rave Razor 2 Ride Towable..not raving about it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this. It was used by my 3 grandchildren, ages 12,9 and 6. After 2 days, the air came out of it. There appears to be no hole. Must be coming out of a seam. It will be returned and I will buy from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Morey

customer_reviews.title: Having a blast on it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on reviews and claims that it would get air. At first we had the air pressure a bit to low and it was too soft making it hard to control. After we filled it up a bit more it was a blast. It's light and easy to maneuver. You can definitely get air on this tube but you have to work it pretty good and get some speed. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: PowerStroker

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am 25 and have mostly similarly aged friends and we’ve had a great time on this. The small(ish) size is perfect for one adult and has the potential to provide a very challenging experience, but is also sturdy enough to be comfortable for those looking for a more tame ride. Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: TannerS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not really big enough for 2 people. We can barely get 2 kids on it. It is the perfect size for 1 adult. The wide shape makes it pretty stable and doesn't flip over too easy. The side handles aren't really functional other than to help pull yourself up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: this towable is great
customer_reviews.text: We really like this towable. The one we got does not quite match the picture and does not have the neoprene shin protector. But it worked fine just the same. It's not super huge like some of the tubes so it is much easier to get back on in the water. Everyone had a great time with it. We used it with both single and double riders. Worked great both ways. Seems sturdy. Boston valve worked well and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My Wife and Daughter took it out for the first time on Father’s Day. My wife and I took turns with Our Daughter. We could maneuver it pretty well. But our 100 pound Daughter could not get it out of the wake. But we all had a blast!!! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good 1-person tube... but too small for 2 people IMO
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself is fine... seems sturdy enough & has lasted through the summer just fine. It holds air well. I'm just disappointed that it wasn't as big as I had hoped it would be. It's great for 1 person, but too small for 2 people (which is what I wanted).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and very durable. I've used mine for several years and bought because my dad had the exact same one we used for 5+ years (and still going strong). We have it through the paces and had no issues You can fit two adults comfortably and the grips are very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Tube
customer_reviews.text: Ok tube for the money. A lot smaller than I expected. It’s ok for youngsters but would be hard to get 2 adults on it. Light and easy to drag to the water though.
customer_reviews.author: Beave

customer_reviews.title: I have to say, this tube has lasted us ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this tube has lasted us 4 years. It has worked from one person, to multiple people. In fact I only had to repair it once, on the zipper line and it was ready to go again. Simple to take the docks and have them help fill it. We got hours upon hours of use out of ours. In fact we would have used it more, but the boat cracked at the hook site for this tube
customer_reviews.author: HolzMill

customer_reviews.title: Fun for one adult or 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: When inflated properly this was fun behind the pontoon boat. I don't think it would work for two adults but it is fine for one adult. It was a tight fit for two 14 year olds. For the price it serves our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fun Tube, kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a number of tubes and kids really like this one. Works really well behind jet ski, less torque due to design and kids really like how its low profile skips across the wake. With about 15 hours on it so far, it has held up very well, seems well constructed, and has provided great value for our family. Would purchase brand and product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It is awkward for two people to use. You either have to lay on top of each other, one holding on front two holders and other on back or both people get on each side and hang on just hanging off. If I thought I could I would send it back. It's really only good for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for two people
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no way big enough for two people one person Rider it would be fine but two people no way
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is sweet! It's easy to pull and great for 1 adult or 2 kids. It feels well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CoachDad

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air - first use it deflated. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: The tube deflated during the very first use. Actually, during the very first rider. I inflated it properly, and the two riders couldn't even finish their ride as the tube got soft. Re-inflated it and it still wouldn't hold air. Double checked the valves/inlets and they're tight. My mistake was not returning it before the return window expired. DON'T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vondi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic towable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic towable for the price. This may not be the largest out there, but it definitely gets airborne. Fits two small (150lbs) adults; it's a tight fit compared to a larger round tube. I have had a 300 lb male get on this and get airborn in windy conditions. My first one lasted 3 years until it developed a small leak - at this price I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CS NC

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun and exciting to ride! It’s not only for kids but adults can ride and enjoy it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Received the product without the valve cap. Had to purchase one. Blew it up, got it on the lake and the seams leaked. The raft filled with water. Thank goodness we discover this before my 8 yr old niece sank. I discourage anyone from buying this. I would give zero stars but they do not give that as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Harbuck

customer_reviews.title: Fun rig
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, abrasive resistant surface I thought was a little small for two.
customer_reviews.author: steve fox

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Kids have had much a great time with this. It is very well made and thick.
customer_reviews.author: junebug

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, use it daily with our teenaged boys and their friends. They love it ! Very well made and good quality
customer_reviews.author: SBGAL

customer_reviews.title: but so far it's fantastic. Very well made cover with what looks to ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for only one season, but so far it's fantastic. Very well made cover with what looks to be a thick-walled bladder. Works great with two kids (probably not so well with two adults.) I'd recommend it highly. One suggestion would be to get a floating tow rope, which helps one to avoid hooking your prop.
customer_reviews.author: JazzerInTheMaking

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had taken it out a couple times with no problems. The 3rd time the inside ripped around the fill cap leaving it impossible to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun in the bay with this raft! Held up extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Santucci

customer_reviews.title: Good tube..
customer_reviews.text: Kids love em. What more needs said? Big enough for an adult but small enough they can actually learn to time and jump wakes making it harder to dump them :) Best tube I have had to date. Well made and lasting good too. Will/would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Tube did not last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than 1 year under light to moderate use on a lake, will no longer hold air for more than 30 min. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Puderbach

customer_reviews.title: The kids said, "Give it five stars!"
customer_reviews.text: When I asked my kids what they thought, they said, "You have to give it five stars!" This is a great tube for my boys (8 and 10). There was ample room for both of them together, and they were catching major air. We used it for a week long camp trip and had no issues. We are very happy with the quality and operation of this towable!
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: This is not a two person tube
customer_reviews.text: This tube is very small to be considered a two person tube My daughter is 5'4 and 100lbs and was too big to comfortably fit on the tube. Do not recommend for what it is advertised
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Was not durable
customer_reviews.text: The kids used it all summer about average. The tube is losing are and it has no holes. The tube cover is coming apart also.
customer_reviews.author: Upsguy29

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN !
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Have two other tubes that cost twice as much but this one is so much BETTER ! My kids have so much fun with this one, it’s their favorite. Keeps you low to the water and super fast !!!
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tube at this great price! We were looking for a tube that wasn't expensive and this was recommended. It did NOT disappoint! We used this tube for a week and it worked great...often had two riders on totaling around 250 pounds! No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where is the check valve/cap???? Item is missing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Went to use this for the first time, but item is missing a part. There is no cap/check valve! Unfortunately its is past the return date. Where do we find a replacement ? This is worthless without the cap.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product-sent back
customer_reviews.text: Product’s zipper ripped after 1 ride on lake. Sent back for a refund. We do understand that wear and tear eventually affects all of our tubes, but not after 1 ride. Will be purchasing a different tube for water tubing activities
customer_reviews.author: John Zisko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great so far to pull behind pontoon with a 115 yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: this is the best quality and price i have found looking for a pull tube. i was surprised at the weight and durability
customer_reviews.author: Frank V. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun!
customer_reviews.text: The super slick bottom really lets the tube fling wide when the boat turns! Excellent fun for anyone that enjoys tubing.
customer_reviews.author: ttmi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Tons of fun for my 4 yr old and i
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: A tad small for large adults.
customer_reviews.text: Tube would be well suited for small adults and children. Did not work well with adults. There is nothing wrong with the craftsmanship of this tube. It just is poorly suited for me. I will be looking to buy one of their larger tubes.
customer_reviews.author: andrew e peters

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised it not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Not as comfortable to sit on as a tube. For the price it's pretty good but not as fun as some of the bigger towables.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We have used this all summer. It’s very sturdy and the kids love it. Perfect so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my two daughters, ages 10 and 12. Have only used 2 days, but has held up fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny L.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Hard for two teens to fit on this tube
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fun, my older teens love it hard for us ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun, my older teens love it hard for us adults to use it since they will ride it non stop if u let them
customer_reviews.author: katrina martinez

customer_reviews.title: (VIDEO) OF RAZOR RAVE IN ACTION! EXCELLENT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER FUN! VERY WELL BUILT! WILL LAST A LONG TIME! SEE MY VIDEO HERE OF THIS TUBE IN ACTION!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a great summer with this 2 person 'tube'. Works well!!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyRon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and said 5 Stars! Very comfortable ride and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this tube. On the third try my 8 year old son was flying thru the wakes and kept saying: Again
customer_reviews.author: Al Santos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just as good as the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: VWTuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube!
customer_reviews.text: This tube glides across the water. Well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: chip4adk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tube
customer_reviews.text: Great tube for one person - two people if smaller in size (e.g. teens). It glides smoothly and gets air, so be careful! The kids all love it.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: so good. We've had this for about a month now ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We've had this for about a month now and it's been on a number of rides. It seems to hold up well for my kids (biggest is 10yr 75lbs), but we have not had any adults on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: So far we really like it
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for one season so I can't speak to its durability but so far we really like it. It is roomy enough for two and catches air easily, which the kids love.
customer_reviews.author: muibien

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great value inflatable for my 8 and 10 year old kids. Might not be great for teens. Only used it once so far but it seems tough.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Kids live it and it will get "air" as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli J Benstead

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: markings came off after only one use. had difficulty get it airborne like in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Butcher

customer_reviews.title: the whole family had a great time on this
customer_reviews.text: the whole family had a great time on this. very sturdy and extremely well made. will love it for years...
customer_reviews.author: barry w

customer_reviews.title: Great first tube!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first tube and it is great, very durable and the kids love it. I have a 65Hp Evinrude and I can barely notice a difference towing this tube, it is very fast and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My 22 year old and friends had a blast! Perfect for 1 or 2 riders.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tube. Can easily put two teenagers on this tube.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee Case Wills

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this tube
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this tube, they are able to have better control and some really good airtime if they like the more adventurous ride. I wish I had bought 2 !
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Best tube!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 225 pounds and ride this thing hard. Best tube I have ever owned. I have puts no less than 30 hours on this without an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: It is stable but allows great action in the wake
customer_reviews.text: This tube exceeded expectations. It has taken some serious abuse from 14-46yr olds. It is stable but allows great action in the wake. I have not needed to add air since first getting it. Will buy another to add to the fleet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality/price and return policy execution
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the cheapest item of it's kind and great to use. My original shipment was never delivered by UPS. Seller immediately shipped a replacement which as it turned out had a leak (likely occurred in shipping). Amazon and seller immediately sent me a 2nd replacement which was perfect. Great items and return policy/execution!!! No problem with replacement item and a lot of fun on water. I am 250 lbs and can stand on it going 35mph. $100+ lower price than elsewhere in sporting goods stores.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T. Nilsen

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Time!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a blast with this tube. A bit tight for two adults but lots of battling for position!
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn't perform as well as my Obrien Screemer that I was replacing with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Mager

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: The kids are loving it! However it seems rough on everyone's elbows.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a ton of fun for our three teenage girls. It can ride two people, but it was a LOT more fun riding single.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a lot smoother riding than previous towables we have had.
customer_reviews.author: tuitionpoorme

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. My family I really enjoyed this tube. I would most definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER M COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Water Fun !!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids really enjoy this! The flying part is somewhat exaggerated, but other wise this gives children and adult a nice ride. Lots of F U N ! ! ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This Towable is pretty fun. We have used it four different times and all have had fun with it. If you are wondering, it does not steer. We have had single riders over 200 lbs and no problem. It has the boston air valve and a good quick connect. Overall it is good. It would be a 5 star if it was more controllable.
customer_reviews.author: B2T2

customer_reviews.title: Fun for single rider.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this towable because the big one we had wasn't fun for a single rider. This one is! Lots of air as you cross wakes. Since we also have a large round tube on the boat this one gets deflated at the end of the day. Deflates and inflates quickly and stores in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: F. Ewton

customer_reviews.title: which my riders enjoyed. Only dissatisfaction thus far is the size
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time, so I can't speak to durability. It does appear to be well made. It has a fair amount of 'bounce' in it, which my riders enjoyed. Only dissatisfaction thus far is the size. I had a Rave Diablo before, which could fit two riders easily. This one can't due to the narrow top. It really a one person tube for anyone of average size over the age of 15. I had two teenagers on it and they were cramped.
customer_reviews.author: C. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: A Blast!
customer_reviews.text: A blast! From 60 lbs to 250 lbs - fun for the entire family. Disappointed with myself for not purchasing sooner!
customer_reviews.author: CDC

customer_reviews.title: Two girls could easily ride at the same time
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with several teenaged girls. Two girls could easily ride at the same time. Very nice tube for the price.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... it behind a pontoon boat has been alot of fun so far - will update again after season but ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this several times so far pull it behind a pontoon boat has been alot of fun so far - will update again after season but holding up great so far - be cautious on take off launch at full throttle and lean back otherwise runs the risk of submerging - but this has been alot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Steen

customer_reviews.title: Great Towable.
customer_reviews.text: The Razor is great. Used for several months before stowing for the winter and it's still fully inflated. Pulls easy, handles great & the kids love it. Plenty of room for 2 pre-teen kids.
customer_reviews.author: NotBigOnFiction

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tube
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this tube! We had the best time with it on vacation. It's well constructed and easy to use. My kids are 10 and 8 - sometimes tubes are too wide and difficult for them to get out of the water. This tube works so smoothly and effortlessly. They were flying in seconds. Great price and great quality tube!!
customer_reviews.author: Kruss

customer_reviews.title: Great towable...
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, ordered this one. Kids and adults use it and enjoy it. The soft handles are a big plus for small and large hands...no blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Lots if fun. My 12 and 13 year old boys have ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots if fun. My 12 and 13 year old boys have fun catching waves and flying on this tube. Good for 1 grown kids. Could fit 2 small kids. Quality seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great towable. Rides high on the water. Perfect behind our pontoon with the reduced drag
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Well contructed.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others that the durability of this towable is amazing for the price. We bought it for its dual purpose of being a towable and also an island. It works well as an island in that it is easy to get onto from the water. The kids also like to use it as a modified trampoline and so far it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The tube I ordered was of excellent quality,However there was no mention of ,or device to inflate it!I had to go to a retailer in the area and purchase the part to inflate the tube,at a cost of $17.99!The retail store was 21 miles from my residence....if I had known the company that sells the tube sold the device to inflate it,I would have ordered it at the same time saving considerable time and money.This is the first time I have had any issues with any orders from Amazon,I will continue to have confidence and trust in Amazon..assuming this is a one time oversight. Thank you, Mike Howard
customer_reviews.author: Mikesz28

customer_reviews.title: New Pontoon Boat and two rider towing float
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at it but until the boating season gets here I will not know how I like it.. It looks fine but I will have to rate and review it later this summer..
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Not yet used
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use these yet. They seen to be as durable as the diablos i bought last year.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Aguilar

product_meta.title: Rave Razor 2-Rider Towable
feature_bullets: Razor The sharp lightweight Razor is a great deck tube that enables the rider to show off the bottom graphics during stunts.
Heavy Duty Polyester Cover with UV Non-Fade to keep the tube looking new, longer!
4-Nylon Covered Handles w/Neoprene Knuckle Guards for comfortable climbing on after being knocked off.
Quick Connect Tow Point - Skim-Fast Bottom Surface w/Base Graphics for a slippery ride
1 - 2 riders or 340 lbs. (154 Kg) max rider weight
